title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - The "Lakshmi Prabha" Edition
materials: VS Clarity Round Cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for superior luster and durability.
features: Floral Inspired Design with Delicate Diamond Settings. Features a repeating petal motif with cascading diamond drops that provide movement and brilliance. This pendant's design balances modern aesthetics with timeless appeal, perfect for the contemporary Indian woman.
colors: Brilliant White Diamonds set against warm Yellow Gold. A classic and sophisticated color combination.
description: Crafted with the highest quality diamonds and 18K gold, this pendant is a true heirloom piece. Its modern design allows for versatile wear, suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. It's a perfect symbol of love and commitment.
